resources.string: A project by Jonathan Warner (@Jaxbot). Not affiliated with or supported by Nissan.
Undismissible notifications will not display on connected Wear devices due to current limitations.

Camp Mode is an experimental feature that will keep your AC on as long as desired, instead of the usual 15 minute limit. This is an experimental feature and while it appears to work in testing, be warned that unexpected behavior may occur. By using this feature, you agree that the developer is not responsible for any damage done to your phone or car, or any other oddities. Do not trust this feature to protect someone who would otherwise be harmed in a hot car.
Refusing to start Camp Mode because the car is not charging and current battery bars are below 3. If the car has been plugged in recently, press Update Now on the main screen.

string-array.name: charge_levels
string-array.item: Show Level 1 time when not charging
Show Level 2 3.3kW time when not charging
Show Level 2 6.6kW time when not charging
